title: Hoi An
short_info: A UNESCO-listed ancient town known for lantern-lit streets, rice fields, and beaches. Offers affordable food and accommodations.

title: Siem Reap
short_info: Gateway to Angkor Wat, featuring a lively town with $3 meals and 50¢ beers.

title: Cusco
short_info: Historic city near Machu Picchu, offering affordable stays and vibrant local culture.

title: Milos
short_info: A Cycladic island with over 70 beaches and charming fishing villages.

title: Bhutan
short_info: Himalayan kingdom emphasizing Gross National Happiness, with monasteries and trekking routes.

title: Nepal
short_info: Home to Everest Base Camp and rich cultural heritage, offering budget-friendly adventures.

title: Albanian Riviera
short_info: Features golden beaches, UNESCO sites, and meals averaging €10.

title: Yogyakarta
short_info: Cultural hub with ancient temples and affordable local cuisine.

title: Cartagena
short_info: Colonial city with Caribbean beaches and vibrant nightlife.

title: Phuket
short_info: Island destination with beaches, nightlife, and budget accommodations.
